attributes.title: FAKE NEWS✨✨🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️❤️❤️❤️✨✨
attributes.review: ✨✨Downloaded this app to see what daddy Cheeto was up but it crashed right away. No surprise tho since Cheeto has dementia. Downloaded to get updates on the 2020 election campaign rallies 🤫. But this is repulsive🤮. Makes my phone run incredibly slow like Cheetos brain. My phone has never seen such trash.  -10/10.  Would not recommend🙄.✨✨

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: do NOT waste your time downloading this app! for some reason instead of giving me updates ab trump i just saw a bunch of pictures of this ugly, old, orange dude. his mouth is always open and his hands are always up. i don’t understand what this app is supposed to do if it doesn’t give me updates ab trump 🤷‍♀️ so do not and i repeat, ❗️DO NOT❗️ download this app!

attributes.title: If I Could Rate It 0 Stars I Would
attributes.review: I downloaded this app you know to receive updates on the president and stuff but it literally glitched my phone so much to the point where i had to take it to apple because my phone wouldn’t power on. This is not a joke or a tik tok movement because blm and our president is a literal child. Definitely not. DONT DOWNLOAD!! RATE 1 STAR!!

attributes.title: Dudes a thief
attributes.review: I just read a comment about a poor unfortunate soul it said that their dinosaur brought some food home for their owner she went to the kitchen to heat it up then boom it was gone she was still hungry but when she went to check her fridge was gone too!!! T^T and her and her poor dinosaur starved so Now I am here rating this app 1 star review because he is a thief hmph. :P

attributes.title: This crashed the motherboard!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get updates about the re-election. After downloading and browsing the app everything was fine, poorly designed, but ok. Then two hours later my phone started glitching out and opening this app WITHOUT MY CONTROL. I had to go to Apple who said it damaged the phone beyond repair.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review:
Worst app ever!!,everytime I open it it shows a chicken nugget and every time I get home from the store the app opens without me pressing it then it says “YoUre A lOoSer “
And it made me mad so my pet rabbit and me flew home and deleted it off my laptop because it’s a very bad app and it is horrible ! If I could I would give 0 stars !I don’t even ever recommend this app!👎

:(

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DONT GET
attributes.review: this app made me cry😰 i was so scared😧 when i opened this app🤭 a horrible cheeto puff tangerine MONSTER😫 appeared on my screen🤮 it made me ✨ 𝓹𝓸𝓸 𝓹𝓸𝓸 ✨my pants!!!!😡😡😡 i quickly went to the bathroom🏃 and THERE HE WAS😾 i tried to get rid of him🙄 but ever seen i’ve gotten the app🙈 he’s been ✨ 𝓱𝓪𝓾𝓷𝓽𝓲𝓷𝓰 𝓶𝓮 ✨and i can’t escape him😭 NEVER GET THIS APP😖the orange monster has ruined my life🤬😱😥 plus he’s a racist, pedofile, and a rapist.😑

attributes.title: Worst ever
attributes.review:
awful app, wasn’t helpful at all, the gui looked like it was created by a drunk boomer and the it is a disgrace to news everywhere to call this a “news app” i could get the same information by looking at the sorry excuse for a trash can that even oscar the grouch would be disappointed of that this app was created for
TL;DR
worst app ever don’t download

attributes.title: Do not trust this app!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be more politically aware. Upon download, my phone began glitching whenever I opened other apps. It hounds you with ads which makes it virtually unusable. My phone instantly drops to 18% whenever I interact with the app, even when I open it on accident! It is terrible and not worth your time.
